descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Frenzy VR is an action fighter all about destruction & interactive environments. 

You can use **any object** as a weapon with our advanced destruction physics for realistic mayhem. Frenzy VR includes a **story mode** with deep narrative secrets, levels, and objectives. Take the chaos into your own hands with **free play modes** allowing unlimited creativity across **various maps** like offices, apartments, prisons, and more.

[media]

# FULLY INTERACTIVE AND DESTRUCTIBLE WORLDS
All maps feature fully destructible items, objects, & enemies
[media]
# RAGDOLL PHYSICS WITH MELEE / RANGED WEAPONS
NPCs use realistic physics ragdolls for ultimate chaos and mayhem
[media]
# STORY MODE WITH NARRATIVE AND CAMPAIGN
Complete the full story with multiple missions and take down the Reborn Company
[media]
# 10+ REALISTIC MAPS AND MISSIONS
Go ballistic in fully interactable worlds built specifically for you to destroy 
[media]
# FULL WEAPON CUSTOMIZATION AND UPGRADES
Realistic gun and melee weapon physics that feel just like real life
[media]
# FIGHT VICIOUS AND CRAZY NPCS
Show no mercy as you fight back against the corrupt NPCs
[media]
# MODS, MINIGAMES AND GAMEMODES
You'll never run out of things to do with our infinitely replayable gamemodes & Mod Support!
[media]
